SEARCH
Package io.brane.rpc

Record Class RpcRetryConfig

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
io.brane.rpc.RpcRetryConfig
Record Components:
backoffBaseMs - base delay in milliseconds (must be > 0)
backoffMaxMs - maximum delay cap in milliseconds (must be >= backoffBaseMs)
jitterMin - minimum jitter percentage (must be >= 0 and < jitterMax)
jitterMax - maximum jitter percentage (must be > jitterMin)
public record RpcRetryConfig(long backoffBaseMs, long backoffMaxMs, double jitterMin, double jitterMax) extends Record
Configuration for RPC retry behavior with exponential backoff.

This record holds the configurable constants for retry backoff timing:

  • backoffBaseMs - Base delay in milliseconds for first retry (default: 200ms)
  • backoffMaxMs - Maximum delay cap in milliseconds (default: 5000ms)
  • jitterMin - Minimum jitter percentage (default: 0.10 = 10%)
  • jitterMax - Maximum jitter percentage (default: 0.25 = 25%)

Backoff Formula: 

   delay = min(base * 2^(attempt-1), max)
   finalDelay = delay + delay * random(jitterMin, jitterMax)

Example: 


 // Default configuration
 RpcRetryConfig config = RpcRetryConfig.defaults();

 // Custom aggressive retry (shorter delays)
 RpcRetryConfig aggressive = RpcRetryConfig.builder()
     .backoffBaseMs(100)
     .backoffMaxMs(2000)
     .build();

 // Custom conservative retry (longer delays)
 RpcRetryConfig conservative = RpcRetryConfig.builder()
     .backoffBaseMs(500)
     .backoffMaxMs(30_000)
     .jitterMin(0.05)
     .jitterMax(0.15)
     .build();
Since:
1.0.0
